title: Crashes
body:
I keep getting low priority queue (20 min wait time) because league keeps crashing on me... 
i'm not made of money so I can't get a new computer, and I've tried re-downloading, repairing and nothing helps...

replies.body:
Heyo TimmoMania,

I'm sorry to hear that you're having issues starting up League of Legends. Can you try the solutions provided in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article? Let me know if anything changes!
